records.name: Ducks
records.quote: How fleeting are all human passions compared with the massive continuity of ducks.
records.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

records.name: Predictability
records.quote: Only the terminally subordinate act in a predictable manner.
records.author: Robert Greene

records.name: Looking at the stars
records.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
records.author: Oscar Wilde

records.name: Sitting
records.quote: The world will not end if I sit here a moment longer.
records.author: Joe Abercrombie

records.name: Guiding your Journey
records.quote: With one eye fixed on the destination, there is only one left to guide you along the journey.
records.author: Robin Sharma
records.source: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari

records.name: Giving Roses
records.author: Chinese Proverb
records.english_translation: A little bit of fragrance clings to the hand that gives you roses.

records.name: Spiderwebs and Lions
records.quote: When spiderwebs unite, they tie up a lion.
records.author: Amharic Proverb

records.name: New Eyes
records.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes.
records.author: Marcel Proust

records.name: Care
records.quote: Care keeps his watch in every old man's eye, And where care lodges, sleep will never lie.
records.author: Shakespeare

records.name: Sitting on Stones
records.author: Japanese Proverb
records.english_translation: Sitting on a cold stone for three years will make it warm.

records.name: Knowing Everything
records.quote: But if I knew everything, there would be no wonder, because what I believe in is far more than I know.
records.author: Madeleine L'Engle
